game.title: Duck Life: Treasure Hunt – Action-Adventure Running Game
name: Duck Life: Treasure Hunt
duck-life-treasure-hunt
game.s_dis: Duck Life: Treasure Hunt is an action-adventure endless runner where you guide a duck through caves, collect coins, unlock costumes, and race against other ducks worldwide.
game.l_dis:
Play Duck Life: Treasure Hunt – Action-Adventure Duck Runner

Duck Life: Treasure Hunt – Unblocked puts you in control of a duck exploring caves for legendary treasures. Run, jump, and fly while collecting coins and upgrades in this fast-paced endless runner.

What is Duck Life: Treasure Hunt?

This spin-off of the original Duck Life series focuses on endless running rather than racing. Players explore cave environments, unlock gadgets, costumes, and pets, and compete with other players online.

How to Play

  • Control the duck: Navigate through cave obstacles using running, jumping, and flying mechanics.
  • Collect coins: Use coins to purchase gadgets, upgrades, and costumes.
  • Unlock costumes: Over 200 costumes to customize your duck’s appearance.
  • Collect pets: Gather over 20 pets to accompany and assist your duck.
  • Compete globally: Race and compare scores with ducks worldwide.

Key Features

  • Endless Runner Gameplay: Navigate caves with running, jumping, and flying mechanics.
  • Character Customization: Unlock over 200 costumes and gadgets for your duck.
  • Pet Collection: Collect and use over 20 pets for bonuses and assistance.
  • Global Competition: Compare scores and race with ducks worldwide.
  • Fast-Paced Action: Reflex-based gameplay keeps each run exciting and challenging.

Why Play Duck Life: Treasure Hunt?

If you enjoy endless runners, action-adventure games, and collectible upgrades, Duck Life: Treasure Hunt delivers fast-paced excitement with customization, pets, and global competition.

Hunt for Treasure!

Run, jump, and fly through caves, unlock new gadgets, and become the ultimate duck adventurer!
